name: market for electricity, high voltage, for internal use in coal mining | electricity, high voltage, for internal use in coal mining | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7759/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is a simplified electricity market. Does not represent a "real" market, but just the distribution of electricity internally generated and used within coal mines.

Input of electrcity for compensation of distribution losses and distribution infrastructure.

Supply of electricity.

exchanges.description:
The amount of required transmission infrastructure is based on the Global Transmission Report (2022) assuming a lifetime of 40 years for the infrastrure.
- Global Electricity Transmission Report and Database, 2022-2031, Global Transmission Research, accessed March 2022
